El Viajero use case:
•Scenario in the context of travelling, with the aggregation of news and blogs 
from different platforms:  “Suplemento El País”, ”Guías Aguilar”, “Canal Viajar” or 
“Prisa Digital”.
•Similar to the News Aggregator Scenario
